For more on this scheme got to ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/gxCTOEbsAK https://t.co/quJRXzuTER

urls.title: What to do in a flood - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
Do you know how to survive a flood? Survivalist Megan Hine explains the three things you need to know üëá 

Over 5 million UK homes are at risk of flooding. Don't assume it won't happen to you.

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/PVo9toSHDz

tweets.text:
As part of our ongoing regulation of the @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry landfill site in #Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme we have carried out an audit and issued the company with a Compliance Assessment Report.

Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn https://t.co/gyKH2icf6z

urls.title: Application guidance: Green Recovery Challenge Fund round 2 | The National Lottery Heritage Fund
urls.description: A short-term competitive fund to kick-start environmental renewal while creating and retaining a range of jobs in England.

tweets.text: Spread the word-funding opportunity- Green Recovery Challenge Fund round 2 #Devon #Cornwall  https://t.co/nfE4m2G4F1  @swbctweets @SWGrowthService @DCPoliceRural_D @DCPoliceRural_C @EnvAgency https://t.co/YgMzMHDoSP

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe That‚Äôs it?! Seriously?! This after every protestation that they are compliant with every aspect of the running of the site. What else is happening and yet not discovered and how can the EA keep ignoring this? Seriously losing hope here üòû

The R. Misbourne at Bottom House Lane today, full of sewage and reeking to high heaven. Globally rare #chalkstream in the heart of the @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @ChilternSociety @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater https://t.co/4Hr8tBwuBq

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 lack of care highlighted yet again & just silence.Thousands in misery,health issues grow, public services & businesses suffer.Newcastle under Lyme & now parts of Stoke are just ‚Äòno go‚Äô stinking zones disgraceful & morally wrong,who will step up? #StopTheStink

@anniekb @ChilternSociety @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater @thameswater are pumping sewage from their balancing tanks upstream, into the Misbourne, to prevent surcharging into properties in Chalfont St. Peter.

Oh dear.

QC has a view that the @EnvAgency must proactively safeguard SSSIs, SACs from harm, like abstraction.

CEO of EA says no we don't.

Just days later @Defra issue guidance to the EA "You MUST NOT WAIT until a site is harmed to put conservation measures in place." Oops. https://t.co/elg6fIrmQs

Why has my neighbour been allowed to dam up the stream at the bottom of our garden? Since it was done, my 70 year old Mum who has health issues is having clear large amounts of silt and vegetation from her section of stream and all the wildlife has gone! Not on! @UckfieldTC

urls.title: Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission gets to work | Yorkshire & Humberside Climate Commission
urls.description: An independent advisory group, set up to support ambitious climate action in Yorkshire and the Humber, has launched today, 17 March. The Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission brings together a team of climate leaders from across the public, private and third sectors, in the largest regional Commission of its kind in the UK.

tweets.text:
We‚Äôre launching today! üì¢

Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission gets to work supporting ambitious climate action across the region. 

Read all about it: https://t.co/QzLBjbGkVl  

1/ https://t.co/hvvMiJabEg
@Kevthegod1 @EnvAgency Hiya, the proposal is for the wall to go in-between the huts that face the sea and those that face the green. Thanks Jo.

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Another slap on the wrist for @Redindustries2 the UK‚Äôs stinkiest waste ‚Äúmanagement‚Äù company from the E.A.  @StinkStopthe and stop poisoning local children.
Complete closure now.

urls.title: Start of the close season: How do we protect our breeding fish at this time of year?
urls.description: Matt Buck, Fisheries Technical Specialist for the Midlands, explains how close season helps protect our breeding fish. Well the evenings are getting lighter, and across the country fish are starting to move out of their winter haunts - a sure ‚Ä¶

tweets.text:
The coarse fish #CloseSeason starts today, meaning it‚Äôs illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers until 15 June inclusive.  

We spoke to Fisheries Officer Matt Buck to find out why the close season is so important üëá

More info: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB #Angling https://t.co/wVVj0shIow

This evening I met with residents from @EastHunsburyPC and Collingtree Park alongside Cllrs @agds2288 and @brandon to discuss concerns about the recent flooding in the area. With multiagency working with @EnvAgency we will report back on progress made in the months ahead.

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe This should not even be a discussion now. We are being severely impacted now. Woke up last night at 2am and could not sleep. Over a mile away and it is beyond ridiculous levels of odour. Is this a police matter now? Being forced out of our homes. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA

Another BREACH!! Enough is enough why should we suffer because this company @RedIndustries2 is not capable! @EnvAgencyMids It is time you instructed @RedIndustries2 to begin capping the Whole of this site. WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/0oH8myGHCL
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Its a start at last. Next thing that needs to be addressed is the convoys arriving at 5.30am. More investigations needed üôè

Could this be you?
 https://t.co/CRJiVLwVr6

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids It is time you instructed  @RedIndustries2 to #capitoff. They can not be allowed to do this to us. Breach after breach after breach. The site is not compliant, some might call it a death trap. #stopthestink #capitoff.

#TeamEA have been working to reduce environmental crime in #Rossendale
